Description: This is in Mint Condition. Awesome Guitar! Hardware has been upgraded to Gold. Hate to see this go, but need to thin out the herd. Comes with LTD Hard case. Open to reasonable offers! Below are Specs. Description Guitars in the LTD EC-1000 Series are designed to offer the tone, feel, looks, and quality that working professional musicians need in an instrument, along with the pricing that typical musicians can still afford. The LTD EC-1000 KOA provides a beautiful koa top on a mahogany body, with set-through construction at 24.75” scale. It offers a 5-piece mahogany/bubinga neck with a 24-fret ebony fingerboard, and black hardware. This striking instrument includes a set of Seymour Duncan Custom 5/Jazz pickups. Features Construction : Set-Thru-Neck Body : Mahogany Top : Hawaiian Koa Neck : 5Pc Mahogany/Bubinga Fingerboard : Ebony Finish : Natural Gloss Neck Contour : Thin U Specifications Construction : Set-Thru-Neck Scale : 24.75" Body : Mahogany Top : Hawaiian Koa Neck : 5Pc Mahogany/Bubinga Fingerboard : Ebony Fingerboard Radius : 350mm Finish : Natural Gloss Nut Width : 42mm Nut Type : Molded Neck Contour : Thin U Frets/Type : 24 XJ Hardware Color : Black Strap Button : Standard Tuners : LTD Locking Bridge : Tonepros Locking TOM Bridge & Tailpiece Neck PU : Seymour Duncan SH-2 Bridge PU : Seymour Duncan SH-14 Electronics : Passive Electronics Layout : Vol/Vol/Tone/Toggle Switch Case : CECFF Case Included : Y
Title: ESP LTD EC-1000 Koa Deluxe Gold
